author: palladia
body: I goofed.  Not sure if I accidentally deleted this line in code.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Is there any way we can add a regression test for this?

comments.author: palladia
comments.body:
I thought about this, but didn't come up with any good way.  Automated tests and interactive dialogs don't mix well.

Can you think of any?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Yeah, definitely difficult. Do we implement [IHostUISupportsMultipleChoiceSelection](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.management.automation.host.ihostuisupportsmultiplechoiceselection%28v=vs.85%29.aspx)?

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: We need to support redirected input and output - that would make automated testing much easier. The Windows host doesn't do this correctly, so don't copy exactly.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @lzybkr Yeah, we need to get an issue tracking that.

title: It's always non-interactive
